Evasive Footwork

You can evade attacks by imposing Disadvantage on melee attacks against you for a round.

Lvl 3 Battle Master (Fighter Subclass)Martial Adept (Feat) grants this feature.

Evasive Footwork is a Passive Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Evasive Footwork works with a Superiority Dice
